coreAttributes.name: duct tape
coreAttributes.description: Backed with woven fabric and covered in plastic, this highly adhesive tape is easily strong enough to keep a person's arms or legs bound together...

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(wrap)] the tape around [npc.her] wrists, effectively binding them together.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(wrap)] the tape around [npc2.namePos] wrists, effectively binding them together.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(wrap)] the tape around [npc2.namePos] wrists, effectively binding them together.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(tear)] off the tape from around [npc.her] wrists.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(tear)] off the tape from around [npc2.namePos] wrists.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(tear)] off the tape from around [npc2.namePos] wrists.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(wrap)] the tape around [npc.her] ankles, effectively binding them together.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(wrap)] the tape around [npc2.namePos] ankles, effectively binding them together.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(wrap)] the tape around [npc2.namePos] ankles, effectively binding them together.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(tear)] off the tape from around [npc.her] ankles.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(tear)] off the tape from around [npc2.namePos] ankles.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(tear)] off the tape from around [npc2.namePos] ankles.
